item.title: [pi] teleport out of jail help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

so i added a jail system to my pi i git the tut off of r-s and when i jail somebody they can still teleport out here is my code. somewere in the code i have to add something to fix the teleporting but idk what to add can anybody help me.

if(c.isInJail()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of jail, are you retarded??"); return; }
